mutants.original_line: s1 = ''.join(char for char in s1 if char.isalpha()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in s1 if char.isalpha())).lower()

mutants.original_line: s2 = ''.join(char for char in s2 if char.isalpha()).lower()
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in s2 if char.isalpha())).lower()
